column5: This Masters degree is designed to equip you with an understanding of the strategies and practices used in international marketing. In addition, you’ll learn analysis of the global marketing environment, different cultures and behaviours, marketing opportunities and strategy options.Through these postgraduate studies, you will critically assess the marketing strategies adopted by a range of global and small enterprises and offer solutions. The added complexity of trading across borders digitally is also featured in this very popular programme.The MSc Marketing (International Marketing) is one of the three pathways available in the MSc Marketing programme. The other pathways are:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
